title: Kris Jenner wears bikini in photo from 1987 shared by Kim Kardashian
text:
Kris Jenner's daughters Kourtney, Kim, Khloe, Kendall and Kylie all look fantastic in a bikini.

And it's easy to see where they got their bodies from as Kim Kardashian shared a flashback photo of the 63-year-old momager when she was in her thirties and looking her very best.

In the image, Kris looks toned as can be as she posed with her friend Faye Resnick.

Mama bear: Kris Jenner's daughters Kourtney, Kim, Khloe, Kendall and Kylie all look fantastic in a bikini. And it's easy to see where they got their bodies from as Kim Kardashian shared a flashback photo of the 63-year-old momager when she was in her thirties and looking her very best

Cover girl: Kris is in a black-and-white string bikini showing off her abs, small waistline, lean legs and sculpted arms

Kim, 38, wrote in her caption, 'I mean... who is hotter than my mom after giving birth to brother!'

She tagged Kris as well as Faye.

The image was taken in 1987 as Kim noted that Kris had just welcomed Rob Kardashian, her only son who has become a recluse since splitting from Blac Chyna.

Kris is in a black-and-white string bikini showing off her abs, small waistline, lean legs and sculpted arms.

Her daughters take after the diva: Kim in her closet taking a selfie in a pink bikini, left. And Kourtney seen at right in a two piece by a swimming pool on KUWTK

The most like mama? Unlike Kim and Kourtney, Khloe is tall like Kris

Jenner was last seen at Justin Bieber's wedding to Hailey Baldwin in South Carolina.

She posed in a photo booth with Kylie Jenner and her daughter Stormi as well as longtime beau Corey Gamble, who has worked with Justin in the past.

Meanwhile, Kim has been in Armenia with her children.

Glam gal still: Jenner was last seen at Justin Bieber's wedding to Hailey Baldwin in South Carolina. She posed in a photo booth with Kylie Jenner and her daughter Stormi as well as longtime beau Corey Gamble, who has worked with Justin in the past

On Tuesday Kardashian attended a public discussion during the World Congress on Information Technology (WCIT 2019) in Yerevan, Armenia.

She wore a white suit with her hair down.

The mother of four also was paying her respects at the Armenian Genocide Memorial in Yerevan as fans asked her for photos.

She was with Kourtney as well.

Talk time: Meanwhile, Kim has been in Armenia with her children. On Tuesday Kardashian attended a public discussion during the World Congress on Information Technology (WCIT 2019) in Yerevan, Armenia
description: Kris Jenner's daughters Kourtney, Kim, Khloe, Kendall and Kylie all look fantastic in a bikini. And it's easy to see where they got their bodies from.
